text: Kataka loka bale, amara allahara upara bisbasa sthapana karechi; kintu allahara pathe yakhana tara niryatita haya, takhana tara manusera niryatanake allahara ayabera mata mane kare. Yakhana apanara palanakartara kacha theke kona sahayya ase takhana tara balate thake, amara to tomadera sathe'i chilama. Bisbabasira antare ya ache, allaha ki ta samyaka abagata nana
